features: ★[Most Comfortable Memory Form Seat Cushion on the Market]---Designed with the highest quality fabric that snugly fits over the foam cushion and is easily removed for cleaning. With an enhanced memory foam formula, the wedge/ U-shaped cut out ergonomic design cushion will contour to the body's pressure points to promote blood flow, help alleviate pain and provide the best comfort and support.

★[Assists You in Relief & Seat Comfort]---Our Coccyx Seat Cushion has proven to restore your spine's natural lumbar curve to the correct posture. You will feel instant relief from lower back pain, numbness and pain from sciatica, herniated discs, tailbone injuries, back pain from pregnancy, hip pain, hemorrhoids, and pressure sores. Use it whenever you are and forget about fatigue!

★[Relief at Last & Never Flat Out]---The ROYI Memory Foam Wedge Cushion for Yourselves is crafted with the highest quality materials designed to provide you comfort and value, distributing your body weight across the seat, reducing pressure on your lower back and coccyx, while promoting proper posture and spinal alignment. Memory foam that does not flatten out. An ideal addition to your chair when you work from home without move around a lot or finish a lot of housework.

★[New Design & Upgrade Engineering]---NON-SLIP mesh rubber bottom ensures that you don’t slide down. What about placing it on the floor for Yoga, meditation? You will find it a perfect solution for kitchen chair, living room chair, couch, recliner, office chair,car seat, airplane, wheelchair. Provides a welcome relief for housewife, pregnancy,office workers,truck drivers and frequent travelers. Combine this cushion and proper movement throughout your day is the best way to keep healthy.

★[Easy Care & Lightweight for Carrying]---It's breathable, velour cover is 100% Machine Washable and easily removed, through its sturdy zipper, for hassle-free cleaning! BUILT-IN HANDLE for easy transport.zippered velour cover for EASY CLEANING

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why should you choose our Seat Cushion? As it is located at the end of your spine. It's also something we don't think about often while we sit, but long periods of sitting play a major role in tailbone and back pain It's a FACT that flat, hard and even traditionally padded seating surfaces cause pressure on your tailbone causing Pain, Poor posture, Improper spine alignment, Decreased blood circulation, Pinched nerves & Orthopedic problems.

This sciatica pillow for sitting relieves pressure on the coccyx, hips, and legs by hugging the thighs with it’s unique design.Patent pending. For: Back Pain During PregnancyBack Pain due to a sports injuryPain, Numbness, Sciatic Nerve DamageHerniated, Bulging DiscPain due to a Bruised, Broken TailbonePain or numbness from sitting for longRoad trips, long flights, seated desk work, long commutes Healthy posture and proper spine alignmentFor Pelvic pressure and hip painFor Lumbosacral SpondylosisFor FibromyalgiaFor Degenerative disc diseaseFor Pressure sores or pressure ulcers
IMPROVE YOUR SIT POSTURE This office chair car seat cushion helps to improve sitting posture, it will eliminates the pain you experiencing when your weight rests on your tailbone.

PERFECT SIZE FOR DIFFERENT PEOPLE Please read the dimension of the product carefully before you choose this one! The orthopedic memory foam coccyx cushion is made from high quality, high density memory foam which firmly supports your back and pelvic region. It is enhanced with a coccyx cut-out which keeps your tailbone suspended so your body weight does not rest on it. PORTABLE, LIGHTWEIGHT, AND EASY TO MAINTAIN Our memory foam cushion affords a strong grip on any surface, fitting over any car, auto, truck or plane seat and allowing you to enjoy travel! It's easy to use with office chairs, kitchen chairs, couches, cars, planes, and wheelchairs for maximum comfort wherever you go! WASHABLE SEAT CUSHION COVER The cover of this pure memory foam car seat cushion can be easily take off. Toss it into the wash machine with cold water. Dryer for free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good back and lower spine support
reviews.reviewText: Very supportive lower back, tail bone and spine cushion. It's feels like firm memory foam, so it's just the right amount of softness. Now that I have to work from home on my kitchen table f-t on my computer, I needed to make my kitchen chair more supportive for my lower back. Especially, since i have a history of lower back pain. I previously had other chair pads, but they were too square shaped for my heart shaped cushion chairs, and not as supportive. So this is so much better shaped for my chairs and support for my back, and for a great price.Just keep in mind I have not had them for that long, so can't speak of longevity yet. But the quality feels great and so I don't think it wil fall apart or loose shape through out time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Seat Cushion too solf
reviews.reviewText: Seat comes in a vacuum sealed pack. It is folded in the middle. The seat doesn't support the back because it was squish in the middle. I've purchased 3 seats in the last five years and the quality of my 1st seat was great. I think they changed the foam inside cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It does nothing to relief hip pain!!!!’

My butt has never felt better sitting on this gel cushion! My chair for my desk is very uncomfortable and would cause me to have a sore lower back and sore butt; well not anymore! I'm a student so I spend most of my time studying or doing my online classes which means more time in my dreaded desk chair. I'm so relieved that this gel cushion has cured all my pain and I no longer feel the unpleasantness of the 'uncomfortable chair.' The cushion itself can be removed from a protective holder (pillow zipped case), so no worries about to getting dirty.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ergonomic and more than just comfort
reviews.reviewText: As of late we've been upgrading our existing seat cushion to these orthopedic specific designed ones. Previous to that, our seat cushions were very economical and generic (what you normally see at your local drugstores) and we've come to learn that they serve no function other than being comfortable, but comes with no actual support. Like our other upgrades, we didn't want to spend medical grade but still wanted ergonomic features - this nailed both those requirements. Our other upgrade was a honeycomb designed cushion. That was popular with some, but not others. We find this filled memory foam design seemingly more acceptable to more of us - but that's subjective, to each their own.Although still very comfortable and a pleasure to sit on, the support is evident right away. The design (the shape and contours) in conjunction with the memory foam does a good job in properly dispersing body weight and gets you in more optimum positions naturally - eg not tiring. With this, it takes pressure away from specific areas that may cause build up after long periods of use. And of course, it makes it that much more natural to achieve better posture all the while being more comfortable. The fabric and general build quality is solid, and we've so far washed it a couple of times and it's no worse for wear. We've tried it on a few different types of chair, including a leather office chair and wooden dining chair and it fits both just as well with no sliding.
Firm, yet soft and comfortable. It’s perfect for chairs that are hard. Works good for sitting long periods.

reviews.reviewTitle: Its very hard. With follow-up comment.
reviews.reviewText: From description and reviews, I had great hopes for this cushion. I can't use it. I have coccyx, sacrum and nerve pain. This cushion made me hurt worse. It was agony to sit on. It's as hard as a rock. The shape is very supportive and might work well for someone who doesn't already have existing pain.August 2019. I was pleased to be contacted by the supplier who asked for my input on the design and features of this cushion based on my experience. They obviously stand behind their product and offer guaranteed satisfaction. I personally can't use this cushion, but I do think most people would find it a good quality product with good support.
